1.title: Thunder on the Run
1.plot: "The Thundermans" cast members Kira, Addison and Jack team up with their super fans for a triathlon that includes a coconut milkshake windstorm and a kayak race.

2.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Run
2.plot: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky, and Dawn's Lizzy Greene, Casey Simpson, and Kyla-Drew Simmons team up with their superfans to party pupu piñata-style, send some gross spiders home, and break a Hawaiian curse.

3.title: Run Shakin'
3.plot: "Game Shakers" cast members Benjamin Flores Jr., Cree Cicchino and Thomas Kuc team up with their fans in a competition featuring a three-legged lobster race, a T-shirt disaster and coded Hawaiian messages.

4.title: A Rockin' Run with Thunder
4.plot: Stars of School of Rock take on stars of The Thundermans in a Hawaiian triathlon, a messed-up dress-up party, and a coconut windstorm before they run to the Final Suite.

5.title: Game on Game Shakers
5.plot: Actors Benjamin Flores Jr., Cree Cicchino and Thomas Kuc ("Game Shakers") team up with superfans to take on a Hawaiian spa, a costume party disaster and a lagoon filled with lost jellyfish to win.

6.title: Paradise Quad Clash
6.plot: "Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn" stars Lizzy Greene, Casey Simpson and Kyla-Drew Simmons team up with superfans to stop up a snotty volcano, match up some wordy squids, and fix giant sandwiches before solving the riddle.

7.title: Thunder-Quad, Assemble!
7.plot: The stars of "Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn" team up with stars from "The Thundermans" to take on some mixed-up squid-words, a leaky volcano nose and a pool full of punch lines.

8.title: School of Rockin' in Hawaii
8.plot: The stars of "School of Rock" team up with their super fans to learn some birdie dances, fix some giant sandwiches and decode hidden messages.

9.title: Clash of the Nick Celebs
9.plot: The stars of "The Thundermans" take on the stars of "School of Rock" in a clash of Nickelodeon celebrities where they race through a Hawaiian spa, fix giant sandwiches and match mixed up jokes.

10.title: Game Shaking Up the Run
10.plot: "Game Shakers" cast members Benji, Cree and Maddie team up with their super fans to build twisted tikis, slingshot bats and find mixed up jokes.

11.title: Shark Tooth Island Run
11.plot: The contestants take on new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano; viewers spot a shark named Finn and go online to win prizes.

12.title: Island in Paradise
12.plot: Contestants take on new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano; viewers spot a shark named Finn and go online to win prizes.

13.title: Paradise Island Run
13.plot: Contestants take on new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano; viewers spot a shark named Finn and go online to win prizes.

14.title: Shark Tooth Surprise
14.plot: Contestants take on new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano; viewers spot a shark named Finn and go online to win prizes.

15.title: Outrigger Run
15.plot: Contestants take on new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano; viewers spot a shark named Finn and go online to win prizes.

16.title: Paradise on the Ropes
16.plot: WWE superstars the Uso brothers and Naomi take on tough new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide.

17.title: Paradise Raw-n
17.plot: WWE superstars Bayley, Apollo and Kalisto take on tough new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide.

18.title: Punching in Paradise
18.plot: WWE superstars Kalisto and the Uso brothers take on tough new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide.

19.title: A Superstar Showdown
19.plot: WWE superstars Jimmy Uso, Naomi and Kalisto take on tough new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide.

20.title: Rumble Run
20.plot: WWE superstars Kalisto and the Uso brothers take on tough new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano that has a water slide.

21.title: Fresh Off the Run
21.plot: Actors Forrest Wheeler, Ian Chen and Hudson Yang take on tough new challenges, including a longer zip line and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide.

22.title: Athletes in Paradise
22.plot: NBA player Glenn Robinson III, Olympic gymnast Danell Leyva and Olympic skier Ashley Caldwell take on tough new challenges.

23.title: Big Time Run
23.plot: Actors James Maslow, Carlos PenaVega and Alexa PenaVega take on tough new challenges, including a longer zip line and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide.

24.title: Going for the Gold
24.plot: Olympic gymnast Danell Leyva, professional skateboarder Lizzie Armanto and Olympic skier Ashley Caldwell take on tough new challenges, including a longer zip line and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide.

25.title: A Modern Wimpy Fuller Run
25.plot: Actors Jason Drucker, Michael Campion and Aubrey Anderson-Emmons take on tough new challenges, including a longer zip line and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide.

26.title: Supersized Prizes in Paradise
26.plot: Contestants take on tough new challenges, a longer zip-line, and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide to win huge prizes worth more than $5,000.

27.title: A Prized Packed Run
27.plot: Contestants take on tough new challenges, a longer zip-line, and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide to win huge prizes worth more than $5,000.

28.title: Big Run, Big Prize
28.plot: Contestants take on tough new challenges, a longer zip-line and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide to win huge prizes worth more than $5,000.

29.title: A Super Sized Run
29.plot: Contestants take on tough new challenges, a longer zip-line and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide to win huge prizes worth more than $5,000.

30.title: High Octane Run
30.plot: Contestants take on tough new challenges, a longer zip line, and a 40-foot volcano with a water slide to win prizes worth over $5,000.

1.title: Besties
1.plot: Three teams of best friends battle for first place as they dive deep for lost party treasures. Then, they have to dance their way across the resort to serve up some cool Hawaiian treats on the beach.

2.title: Splish-Splash and Dash
2.plot: After splish-splashing their way to the pool and tossing tubes to each other, three teams try to solve a very tricky tiki puzzle before running to the beach to put on some extra special Hula outfits.

3.title: Girl Power
3.plot: Three girl duos have to pedal hard to gather beach balls but the resort's waterfall almost sinks their boats. Then, before they can reach the finish line, more than one team gets stuck on the riddle.

4.title: Puzzled Tiki
4.plot: Teams battle it out in a race where teamwork and memorization are key. A detour could sink one team's chances at the waterfall while the others splash down the slide to get puzzled by an ancient tiki.

5.title: Dig, Slide and Toss
5.plot: After digging for Sand Dollars on the beach, three teams of siblings and besties hop their way across super slippery islands to toss some coconuts before scrambling to set up a very important cabana.

6.title: Panic Under the Falls
6.plot: As the teams speed across the resort, they discover it's hard to get an angry tiki in line and filling up a bucket under the raging waterfall proves no easy task.

7.title: Cabana-Rama Adventure
7.plot: Teams sprint to the pool to toss leis at each other and try not to wipe out on the slippery islands before going on a free-for-all scavenger hunt to build a very important cabana.

8.title: Hidden Zodiac
8.plot: Three teams order up some fun racing around a Hawaiian resort and flex their searching skills for animals hidden around the pool.

9.title: Where's My Charger
9.plot: Three teams dash across a Hawaiian resort, but some bad steering at one of the pedal boats could sink another's chances. Then, one team gets stuck on a very tricky grid at the bottom of the slide.

10.title: What a Mess
10.plot: It's BFFs vs. cousins vs. twins in a race around a Hawaiian resort that's anyone's game. The teams order up some fun in the lagoon, then Hula across the island to hunt for several lost items.

11.title: Riddle Me This
11.plot: Three teams toss giant rings overboard on a wet and wild adventure in Paradise where they must build a giant tiki and Hula their way through a scavenger hunt on a race to victory.

12.title: Hula What?
12.plot: BFF's rule in this super tight race around paradise where three teams must Hula their way over to the pool to find lost treasures.

13.title: Moving Statues
13.plot: Three teams scramble to find and match phrases on the floating bottles in the lagoon, then some get stumped by giant animal statues around the pool in a wild zodiac-themed challenge.

14.title: Raging Falls
14.plot: Three teams speed across the resort, discovering that it is hard to get an angry tiki in line and that it is not easy to fill a bucket under a raging waterfall.

15.title: Going Coconuts for Sand Dollars
15.plot: Digging up enough sand dollars is no easy task as three teams paddle across the lagoon, then try to set up a crazy cabana before tossing coconuts AND leis in a very slippery challenge.

16.title: Mix N Match
16.plot: Three teams of besties race to the finish line of a Hawaiian resort, matching phrases floating in the lagoon. But one team's momentum gets tripped up by a costly mistake.

17.title: Water Wonderland
17.plot: Teams scramble to check out of their hotel rooms, then get into their boats to do battle with a waterfall before using their spelling and swimming skills to make an island connection.

18.title: Are We There Yet?
18.plot: Racing to the number one spot, three teams each test their memory on a tricky slide and then brave the jungle to wake up a sleeping tiki. But one team gets waterlogged while fighting to hold the lead.

19.title: Puzzles in Paradise
19.plot: Three pairs of teammates scramble to match a funny set of Hula outfits. Then, they rush to the pool to toss tubes onto slippery islands before using their smarts to solve a very special puzzle.

20.title: What's Apple-Pine?
20.plot: Three teams rush to deliver everything but the kitchen sink, to hotel guests for a tip. Then, they race to the beach to start matching floating word pairs before a mad dash to the finish line.

1.title: It's All About the Thunder-man!
1.plot: In the second-season opener, cast members from "The Thundermans" team up with fans to throw fish and zip-line to a wedding.

2.title: NRDD Run for Charity
2.plot: Paradise Run welcomes the stars of Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn, as Lizzy Greene, Mace Coronel and Kyla-Drew Simmons take on a packed minivan, party pedal boats, and a giant ukulele!

3.title: Thundermans in Paradise
3.plot: The Thundermans are on Paradise Run! Kira Kosarin, Addison Riecke , and Ryan Newman pair up with their biggest superfans to zip into a 70's dance party with an appearance from Jack Griffo!

4.title: NRDD in the House
4.plot: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn do Paradise Run! Stars of the hit show team up with their super fans and run to extinguish an unusual volcano, match mixed-up packages, and make a crazy lei.

5.title: A Nick Showdown in Paradise
5.plot: The stars of The Thundermans take on the stars of Nicky, Ricky, Dicky, & Dawn in this action-packed special episode. Plus, a special appearance from Jack Griffo!

6.title: Whose Underwear Is That?
6.plot: Three teams of best friends and siblings search for sunken treasure, run in frozen underwear and catch some flying fish.

7.title: I Scream for Ice Cream
7.plot: Teams of best friends battle cousins to become VIPs, make a massive waffle cone treat and tune up a giant ukulele.

8.title: Lava Reception
8.plot: A boiling volcano, epically lost phones, and mixed-up mail in the lagoon, challenge three teams of best friends in paradise.

9.title: Forgive You Not!
9.plot: In a Hawaiian Paradise, three teams of BFF's and siblings battle to save a family of turtles, sport a sumo-size sponge suit, and run to a very wet wedding.

10.title: Crazy Lei, Crazy Time
10.plot: Sisters compete against two BFF teams in an epic battle to rebuild a wobbly reef, shop for snorkel gear, and string a colorful lei by flying down a massive slide.

11.title: What's My Flavor?
11.plot: Two teams of best friends take on a brother-and-sister duo where they must rocket rainbow scoops, tune up a ukulele and dress to impress.

12.title: Something's Fishy
12.plot: Can you say Humuhumunukunukuapua'a? To win the run in Paradise, BFF and sister teams must name Hawaii's state fish and wear multiple pairs of frozen shorts.

13.title: The Butt Squeeze
13.plot: Three fierce teams battle each other in a tight race where they suit up in giant sponge suits to quash their beefs.

14.title: Zip, Launch & Fly
14.plot: Things fall apart in Paradise when a 12- year-old uncle and his 11-year-old nephew battle twins and a brother/sister team to save a wedding.

15.title: Paradise Express
15.plot: Three teams of children must cool down a volcano and find hidden cell phones to win a tropical vacation.

16.title: Skip, Drip & Zip
16.plot: A 12-year-old uncle and his 11-year-old nephew battle twins and a brother-and-sister team to save a wedding.

17.title: Salute Your Frozen Butt
17.plot: Teams of best friends battle racing twins as they search for sunken secrets in the lagoon, thaw their butts and hurl giant fish.

18.title: Very Important Party
18.plot: Best friends battle against sibling teams in a competition to face the music, scream for ice cream and dazzle a bouncer.

19.title: Volcano a Go-Go
19.plot: Three teams race to crush their competition in epic challenges.

20.title: Can You Hear Me Now?
20.plot: Two teams of best friends battle cousins in a competition to learn how to speak snorkel, zip line through a coral mess and make the perfect lei.

imdb.title: Paradise Run
plot: A Race style game show where children race in a tropical setting while completing puzzles along the way.
